name: Invoke_Method

Conversation_Output.description: Message to user indicating response to request

Question.description: returns True if no method invocation was requested

scale.description: scale of which to scale entitiy by

name.description: name of object user wants to invoke if not asking for specific method invocation

description: Invoke the correct method with specificed parameters based on methods, if user asks for information instead of a method invocation, Question is True
